bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: Halifax County was formed in 1752 from Lunenburg County.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Halifax County (Va.) Commonwealth Cause, Commonwealth vs. Jack [Slave], April 1802. Consists of an indictment and two warrants for the arrest of Jack, a slave accused of preparing poisons.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Additional Halifax County Court Records can be found on microfilm at The Library of Virginia. Consult "A Guide to Virginia County and City Records On Microfilm" found on the Library of Virginia web site at www.lva.lib.va.us/whatwehave/local/local_rec/index.htm.
